name: O'Fox Life
description: O'Fox Life - Platformer, the main character is a Fox. In the game you have to help the main character to take a long way home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 10 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 10 MB available space
